name: Keep away Morbid
description:
4 colors: blue, black, green, white

Scare away Morbid by double clicking him, make sure to do it fast or you'll lose! Do this for 30 seconds and you'll win.

Main bg music: https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/downloads-c/suspenseful-music...

Splat sfx: https://pixabay.com/sound-effects/search/blood/

Scream sfx: https://www.zapsplat.com/sound-effect-category/screaming/page/5/

Kids cheering sfx: https://www.myinstants.com/en/instant/kids-cheering/
